overview_of_class: This is a year-long course in fist-year Korean designed for beginning learners. This course is designed to develop students' all-around communicative skills in speaking, listening, reading and writing with a great emphasis placed on developing a conversational skill. The objective of the course is to learn the basic communication skill in light with cultural appropriateness in the target language.
name: Korean I
subject: KOREAN
